name: Genxsystems
tagline: Solution for all types of requirements for IT
description:
Genx Systems was founded by successive entrepreneur with a passion for going the extra step to make their customers succeed. It is incorporated with the aim of providing economic solutions to the ever-increasing IT demands of organizations.
 We specialize in delivering guaranteed authentic IT products at exceptionally competitive prices. We provide services that satisfy our clients with a quick turnaround, excellent communication and reporting mechanisms. We are highly equipped and professionally managed company based in the heart of Dubai –Bur Dubai, having business alliances in various parts of the world.
READ MORE...
